name: Anyplace Mafia party app. Mafia / Werewolf games P
name_original: Anyplace Mafia party app. Mafia / Werewolf games P
description:
Anyplace Mafia PRO will completely substitute a set of cards for playing Mafia card game (party game). Play Mafia in any place and any time!

 Anyplace Mafia PRO hits top charts in card games and board games in App Store in US, Germany, Canada, Great Britan, Russia, Australia and many other countries!

1. Simple interface!  
Start the game in 10 seconds – just press “Quick start” and set the number of players. Players will understand their roles by taking device and opening their card in the app.

  2. For any kind of rules of the Mafia (or Werewolf) game!
 You can create any needed game characters and set how many of them should be in the game. 

3. Stylish design! 
Enjoy stylish design of the app and specially created deck of cards with main game characters! 

4. Opportunity to customize! 
You have the opportunity to change basic deck of cards to another one, drawn in different and unique style!

  5. Great sound effects!
 You and your friends will enjoy from specially selected sound effects!

6. Up to 19 players!
You can enjoy Mafia party game with up to 19 friends. Enough for ANY party!

7. Timer for game master.
Will help to manage the game and makes it easier and more organized!

8. No ADS!

You no longer need cards, pen & paper or Mafia game set.  Anyplace Mafia in your device will substitute all these things. And you will save monay as our app is much cheaper than usual Mafia party game set.

Environment friendly!
You will also help to preserve world ecology by saving paper and other materials needed to produce cards and other stuff needed for Mafia game set.
